issue.title: Gazebo simulation freezes on right click with this world file.

content.raw: I tested this world on a current version of Gazebo and it didn't cause a crash. In the issue you specified version 1.4 - is that the Gazebo version you're using? If I'm not mistaken, support for polylines came in a later version and it was vastly improved on Gazebo6.
content.html: I tested this world on a current version of Gazebo and it didn't cause a crash. In the issue you specified version 1.4 - is that the Gazebo version you're using? If I'm not mistaken, support for polylines came in a later version and it was vastly improved on Gazebo6.
